/* intrBoardInqy10101011 : 공지사항 목록 건수 조회 */ SELECT COUNT(BRD.BRD_IDX) AS LIST_CNT FROM INTR_BOARD BRD WHERE 1 = 1 AND BRD.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(BRD.BRD_TITLE),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','') LIKE '%'||REGEXP_REPLACE(LOWER(#{srchNm, jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'[^0-9가-힣A-Za-z]*','')||'%'
AND BRD.REG_DT >= REPLACE(#{srchSdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')
AND BRD.REG_DT <= REPLACE(#{srchEdt, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'-','')

/* intrBoardInqy10102010 : 공지사항 상세 */ SELECT BRD.BRD_IDX , BRD.BRD_TITLE , BRD.EMP_IDX , EMP.EMP_IDX , EMP.EMP_NM , EMP.DEPT_CD , DEPT.DEPT_NM , EMP.GRADE_CD , GRADE.GRADE_NM , BRD.BRD_CONTENT , BRD.BRD_READHIT , BRD.REG_DT , BRD.REG_TM , BRD.USE_YN , BRD.DISP_ORDER , BRD.REMARK FROM INTR_BOARD BRD LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_EMP EMP ON BRD.EMP_IDX = EMP.EMP_IDX LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_DEPT DEPT ON DEPT.DEPT_CD = EMP.DEPT_CD AND DEPT.USE_YN = 'Y' LEFT OUTER JOIN INTR_GRADE GRADE ON GRADE.GRADE_CD = EMP.GRADE_CD AND GRADE.USE_YN = 'Y' WHERE BRD.BRD_IDX = #{contentIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: /* intrBoardProc10101010 : 공지사항 등록 처리 */ INSERT INTO INTR_BOARD ( BRD_IDX , EMP_IDX , BRD_TITLE , BRD_CONTENT , BRD_READHIT , REG_DT , REG_TM , USE_YN , DISP_ORDER ) VALUES ( #{contentIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{empIdx, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{brdTitle, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{brdContent, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , 0 , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') , 'Y' , ( SELECT NVL(MAX(DISP_ORDER),0) + 1 FROM INTR_BOARD ) )
